fields.name: Target
fields.description: IP address or host name of an NFSv3 host (e.g., 10.0.44.44).

fields.name: UsageModel
fields.description: Identifies the StorageCache usage model to be used for this storage target.

fields.name: VerificationTimer
fields.description: Amount of time (in seconds) the cache waits before it checks the back-end storage for file updates.

fields.name: WriteBackTimer
fields.description: Amount of time (in seconds) the cache waits after the last file change before it copies the changed file to back-end storage.
